name: PBTSearch
short_description:
Java metasearch for P2P private torrent trackers. Works in Linux, Windows and Mac platforms.

You only needs accounts from different trackers. You login, from PBTS, to the trackers in which you already have accounts. Then you can search content in which trackers you want to search.

The information about your login are only saved in your pc for local access. PBTS use this information directly to the trackers. You can view the code, it's Open Source! and check it.

Avaliable trackers:
BitSoup, MVTracker, XSpeeds, PublicHD, BajaunaPeli, XBytes, BitShock, Blu-bits, blu-torrents and Torronteros.

Added trackers: speedCD, torrentShack, slickerthanhell, all4nothin, HunterBT, Nova+, trackerChile.

You can collaborate with this project in order to add more trackers or more characteristics.
summary: Search for torrent in private trackers. Works in all platforms.
